info.description: Public HTTP API for the Fitness Tracker app.
info.title: Fitness Tracker API

get.description: Returns a paginated list of users with optional filtering and sorting.

post.description: Sends a password reset flow for the specified user.
Replaces the user's roles with the provided list of role names.
Lets the user ask AI any general-purpose question.
Lets the user ask AI about stats-related information.
Lets the user ask AI about workouts and training.

get.summary: Get current workout cycle for user

get.description: Returns version strings for locales/namespaces to enable client-side caching. Supports ETag caching.

post.description: Publishes a missing translation entry for all provided languages.

get.description: Returns a key->value map for a given locale and namespace. Supports ETag caching.

post.summary: Get or create an individual exercise

post.description: Returns an access token in JSON and sets a refresh token cookie.

204.description: No Content when profile is empty

post.description: Reads refresh token cookie and returns a new access token.

get.summary: List workout plans for current user
List cycles for a workout plan

post.summary: Bulk create workouts in a cycle

get.summary: List sets of a workout exercise

question.example: What is the capital of France?

answer.example: The capital of France is Paris.

body.example: The system will be down for maintenance at midnight.
